functions.name: submitEncryptedPing
functions.description: Submits an encrypted ping using Legacy Telemetry in Firefox

parameters.name: payload
parameters.description: The payload of the legacy telemetry ping.

addPioneerId.description: Whether or not the ping should contain the Pioneer ID

encryptionKeyId.description: The public key ID to use

publicKey.description: The public key to use (JSON Web Key)

functions.name: generateUUID
functions.description: Generate a random UUID using the Firefox APIs
